title: Alilang Intricate Vintage Inspired Antique Tone Multicolored Floral Crystal Flower Brooch Pin
features: VINTAGE INSPIRED DESIGN. This gorgeous detailed brooch draws inspiration from the past fashion periods. Delicate florals and copper tone filigree curls give this flower brooch a delightfully delicate appearance. The antique look makes it look like a statement piece from the Renaissance or Victorian periods.

SOFT MULTICOLORED CRYSTALS. The center of this brooch sits a charming flower composed of six different colored rhinestone crystal. The larger petals of the brooch are decorated with just enough crystals scattered around to add a good amount of sparkle without covering up the detail of the antique base.

PERFECT FOR MANY OCCASSIONS. This brooch looks absolutely stunning in person and works well with a variety of looks. Attach to a coat lapel, a blouse, or a bag for a bit of sparkle and shine. This particular style works well with vintage or boho inspired dresses as well. Vintage inspired weddings, an anniversary gift for someone who loves subtle jewelry, a creative way to enhance your prom or homecoming outfit?? the uses for this pin are endless.

BEAUTIFULLY PACKAGED. Most of our jewelry arrives in a complimentary Alilang gift box, while bigger pieces are packed in neat organza bags. It makes a GREAT GIFT for anyone who loves fashion accessories.
description: Add a bit of floral elegance to your look with this Alilang flower brooch. The perfect accessory if you're looking for an easy way to quickly change up or enhance your look. A bit of sparkle goes a long way and florals are one of those designs that'll never go out of style.
